style.desktop: /* Hide anime spoilers */ /* Hide thumbnail */ [data-episode-grid-item]:not([data-is-watched="true"]) [data-episode-grid-item-image], [data-episode-card-image] { filter: blur(12px); } /* Hide description, title, filename */ [data-episode-grid-item]:not([data-is-watched="true"]) [data-episode-grid-item-episode-title], [data-episode-grid-item]:not([data-is-watched="true"]) [data-episode-grid-item-episode-description], [data-episode-grid-item]:not([data-is-watched="true"]) [data-episode-grid-item-filename], [data-undownloaded-episode-list="true"] [data-episode-grid-item-image-background], [data-undownloaded-episode-list="true"] [data-episode-grid-item-episode-description], [data-undownloaded-episode-list="true"] [data-episode-grid-item-episode-title] { filter: blur(3px); margin-left: -2px; mask-image: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, black 2ch, black calc(100% - 3ch), transparent); } [data-episode-card-title="true"] { filter: blur(4px); } /* Only disable episode info button */ [data-episode-grid-item]:not([data-is-watched="true"]) [data-episode-grid-item-action] > [type="button"][aria-haspopup="dialog"] { opacity: 0.1; pointer-events: none; }

body[data-scroll-locked] .scroll-locked-offset { padding-right: 0; } body[data-scroll-locked] [data-custom-library-banner-container] { width: 100vw !important; } [data-episode-card-image-container].rounded-xl { --border-radius-xl: 0.85rem; clip-path: inset(0 round var(--border-radius-xl)); }

/* Filter Torrent Streaming */
[data-torrent-name*="AV1"],
[data-torrent-name*="mini"],
[data-release-group="EMBER"],
[data-release-group="ASW"],
[data-release-group="Ohys-Raws"],
[data-release-group="DKB"],
[data-release-group="Cleo"],
[data-release-group="Anime Time"],
[data-release-group="Tenrai-Sensei"],
[data-release-group="AniDL"],
[data-release-group="Exiled-Destiny"],
[data-release-group="DeadFish"],
[data-release-group="DB"],
[data-release-group="Kirion"],
[data-release-group="neoDESU"],
[data-release-group="neoHEVC"],
[data-release-group="Judas"] {
  display: none !important;
}

[data-media-entry-characters-section-grid-item-image-container] { transition: 0.4s ease-in-out; &:hover { transform: scale(3); z-index: 99999 !important; } &:hover [data-media-entry-characters-section-grid-item-image-background="true"] { background: unset !important; } &:hover [data-media-entry-characters-section-grid-item-image] { object-fit: contain !important; } }

name: Remove fade-in effect on loading anime or manga entry
author: Rinkerbel

name: Show Multi-Sub | Dual Audio Torrents Only
author: kRYstall9

style.desktop: /* Display only [Multi Sub | Dual Audio] Torrents */ [data-torrent-preview-item="true"]:not([data-subtitle*="Multi-Subs"]):not([data-subtitle*="Dual Audio"]){ display: none; }

name: Alternative compact episode card (6 row per column)
author: folfoẚ

style.desktop: /*Seanime compact grid card (6) */ [data-episode-list-grid] /* container */{ grid-template-columns: repeat(6,minmax(0,1fr)); display: grid !important; } [data-episode-grid-item-image-container] /* thumb */{ border-radius: 4px; width: 100%; } [data-episode-grid-item-image-overlay] { box-shadow: inset 0 0 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); } [data-episode-grid-item-content] { display: grid; position: absolute; bottom: 2px; right: 4px; text-shadow: 0px 0px 3px rgb(0,0,0), 0px 0px 1px rgb(255,255,255); } [data-episode-grid-item-episode-title] { font-size: 0.9rem !important; bottom: 2px; right: 4px; text-align: right; text-wrap: balance; } [data-episode-grid-item-title] { font-size: 0.9rem; bottom: 2px; right: 2px; text-align: right; } [data-episode-grid-item-episode-description], [data-episode-grid-item-filename] { display: none !important; }

name: Alternative compact episode card (4 row per column)
author: folfoẚ

style.desktop: /*Seanime compact grid card (4) */ [data-episode-list-grid] /* container */{ grid-template-columns: repeat(4,minmax(0,1fr)); display: grid !important; } [data-episode-grid-item-image-container] /* thumb */{ border-radius: 4px; width: 100%; height: 9rem !important; } [data-episode-grid-item-image-overlay] { box-shadow: inset 0 0 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); } [data-episode-grid-item-content] { display: grid; position: absolute; bottom: 2px; right: 4px; text-shadow: 0px 0px 3px rgb(0,0,0), 0px 0px 1px rgb(255,255,255); } [data-episode-grid-item-episode-title] { font-size: 0.9rem !important; bottom: 2px; right: 4px; text-align: right; text-wrap: balance; } [data-episode-grid-item-title] { font-size: 0.9rem; bottom: 2px; right: 2px; text-align: right; } [data-episode-grid-item-episode-description], [data-episode-grid-item-filename] { display: none !important; }
body::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 0px; background: transparent; } *::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 0px; background: transparent; }

name: Show tray plugin only when hovering
author: folfoẚ
